about.title: About Me
about.whoIAmText: I'm a Data Science student and product-minded builder. Curious, resourceful and detail-oriented, I care about clarity, usability and a smooth experience for real users.
about.whatIDoText: Data Analyst and developer of web, app platforms and small tools that solve concrete problems. I iterate quickly, ship frequently, and validate ideas with working prototypes and measurable outcomes.
about.myMissionText: Build thoughtful digital products that empower students and entrepreneurs in Africaâ€”scalable, reliable and simple to use. I'm driven by impact and continuous improvement.
